author: Alana Mastrangelo
title: Florida District Fired Pansexual Middle School Art Teacher After She Discussed Sexuality with Students

sentence: This comes after Florida Republican Governor Ron DeSantis signed the so-called "Don't Say Gay" bill into law in March.

title: Florida Teacher Fired for Discussing Sexual Orientation Sparks Debate

title: Florida teacher says she was fired after discussing pansexual identity with middle school students
